Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Office of the Mayor](https://www.newarknj.gov/161/Office-of-the-Mayor)

   Ras J. Baraka is the 40th Mayor of the City of Newark.
2. #### [Council Members](https://www.newarknj.gov/160/Council-Members)

   View members of the City Council.
3. #### [Municipal Council Meetings](https://newark.legistar.com/Calendar.aspx)

   Access easily searchable meeting agendas and minutes for the Municipal Council meetings.
4. #### [Public Notices](https://www.newarknj.gov/532/Public-Notices)

   View list of current public notices.
5. #### [City Budget](https://www.newarknj.gov/351/City-Budget)

   View budget documents.
